page.title: 16THE NEW PARK IN SINFIN.
page.content: In the new park the council have built a gymnasium. It was built about a year and a half ago. It has 7 changing rooms, toilets and one big room where they put two tabletennis tables. My dad works there on his own because he is a park ranger. All week children go there to play tabletennis and at weekends football teams go there to play and use the changing rooms. There are 9 football pitches outside on the park. The manager of the team has to pay for the changing rooms and the pitch. My dad works there all the time except when he has his days off, which are Tuesday and Wednesday. Apart from that the tabletennis room is open for the rest of the week. The tabletennis room is open from 9.30 to 4.30. By Terence.
